[h1] TU SALUD MENTAL VA PRIMERO. [/h1]

No malinterpreten mis palabras, es un muy buen juego pero es imposible recomendarlo. Me explico, desde luego que es adictivo, entretenido y hasta desafiante cuando te propones mejorar tu nivel de habilidad. Aún así, todo se va a la cloaca cuando hace aparición su comunidad tan tóxica. En todas las partidas hay gente insultándose o arruinando la experiencia de juego por puro capricho, eso sin contar la enorme cantidad de hackers que te dejan la sensación de estar malgastando tu tiempo. Repito, un excelente título pero su esencia quedó sepultada por una comunidad putrefacta repleta de frustrados tanto dentro como fuera del juego.

Dont play if you're toxic or easily gets triggered. Kids who dont have as evolved brain as adults are also playing this game. Because it is free to play - hackers also excist! So buy The game and get the Anti-hacker package. You'll be good to go ;) Very well made game, very well made skins. Game that actually allows you to get "deep" and learn alot of stragegy. You'll find this game hella' fun if you just learn the map calls. Brilliant game at my point of view.
je recommande ce jeu à d'autres utilisateurs.

This game is the Lil Dicky of video games. You play it for the first time and everyone is like "this game is pretty cool I love it" and you play it non stop for days on end but then after a while you think the game gets boring doing the same thing over and over without ranking up but then there is a new update and they add a new map or new gun like when Lil Dicky releases a new song and its good again but just like when Lil Dicky doesnt have new songs, then it isnt relevant anymore. That is this game.
